select re.*

, (select subjectName from subject sub where re.replaceSubject =sub.code order by year desc limit 0, 1) replaceSubjectName
from replaceSubject re
INSTR(re.subjectCode, #{st})>0 INSTR(sub.subjectName,#{st})>0
